name: ImmowGram
description:
Welcome to my Nonogram game.

The game features 200 puzzles that are randomly generated (you need Chrome to play it), refresh the page if it gets stuck loading).

Advanced features for a smoother puzzle epxerience!

Hold down control to get the total count per row or column.

Left and Right mousbutton to mark or cross a cell.

I hope you have fun playing :)
